body: hi @trwnh ! I assume you mean JSON Schema? There's been discussion of including `$schema` in addition to `@context` in YAML-LD, see https://github.com/json-ld/yaml-ld/issues/11
Hi @VladimirAlexiev,  No, I meant an RDF Schema and/or OWL Ontology, serialized as JSON-LD.  For example: https://w3id.org/fep/1985.jsonld
